LanguageData.Charity_Essential.label: essential
LanguageData.Charity_Essential.description: We must always be charitable to those in need. To refuse one would be an inhuman act, no matter the circumstances.
LanguageData.Charity_Important.label: important
LanguageData.Charity_Important.description: It's important to be charitable to those in need. Refusing to help is a terrible act.
LanguageData.Charity_Worthwhile.label: worthwhile
LanguageData.Charity_Worthwhile.description: Helping those in need is a good thing. It makes the community stronger.
